email_text:
Subject: Your Spotify Premium Renewal Confirmation

Dear [Customer Name],

We are pleased to inform you that your Spotify Premium subscription has been successfully renewed for another month. Thank you for choosing to continue enjoying ad-free music streaming, offline playback, and unlimited skips on Spotify Premium.

Billing Details:
Subscription Plan: Spotify Premium
Subscription Period: [Start Date] - [End Date]
Renewal Date: [Renewal Date]
Billing Amount: $9.99
Payment Method: [Payment Method]

Please note that your payment has been processed and your account will remain active without interruption. If you have any questions or concerns regarding your subscription, billing details, or account status, please feel free to contact our customer support team at support@spotify.com.

Thank you for being a valued member of the Spotify community. We hope you continue to enjoy your Premium experience.

Warm regards,

The Spotify Team
